Name: Het Bestekje
Review Text: The food was excellent, so tasty, perfectly seasoned, cooked just right, the meat was succulent, juicy and presented beautifully. The ambience was warm and cosy, typically Dutch, and the staff were very friendly and welcoming..attentive but not overly so.

Name: Het Bestekje
Review Text: Comfortable place, nice guys, good beer, food are a bit too salty, salad is tasty

Name: Het Bestekje
Review Text: Great food and good atmosphere. The mushroom starter is amazing! Also big portions and reasonably priced

Name: Het Bestekje
Review Text: I ate an xl beefburger with bacon and it was delicious. In fact got too much. So a good value for money. The waitress was also nice and came back a lot for drinks and other stuff. Enjoyed it!

Name: Het Bestekje
Review Text: Good food but slow service, they seemed understaffed.

Name: Het Bestekje
Review Text: Enough food for a great price.

Review Text:
